column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////An hour passed. The bartender asked if I wanted to order dinner. I mentioned that I was waiting for my table and asked if she would mind checking the status. In a few moments a gentleman approached. With numerous apologies he explained they had
column3: lost me. He said my drinks would obviously be taken care of and pointed out several tables and told me to take my pick. I chose a large booth and settled into the deep red leather seat.
